title: The west-country miser: or, An unconscionable farmer's miserable end: who having hoarded up his corn in hopes it would rise to a higher price, was disappointed so that he fell into despair, and died at last by the fright of an apparition. Tune of, Love's sweet passion: or, Fond boy, &c.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for J. Wolrah, in Holbourn.,
